parse: Verb - Present Imperative Passive - 2nd Person Plural
str2: A primary verb; to convince; by analogy, to pacify or conciliate; reflexively or passively, to assent, to rely.

parse: Personal / Possessive Pronoun - Genitive 2nd Person Plural
str2: You. The person pronoun of the second person singular; thou.

parse: Verb - Present Participle Middle or Passive - Dative Masculine Plural
str2: (a) To lead, (b) To think, be of opinion, suppose, consider.
And, even, also, namely.

parse: Verb - Present Imperative Active - 2nd Person Plural
str2: To yield, submit to authority. From hupo and eiko; to surrender.
For. A primary particle; properly, assigning a reason.

parse: Personal / Possessive Pronoun - Nominative Masculine 3rd Person Plural
str2: He, she, it, they, them, same. From the particle au; the reflexive pronoun self, used of the third person, and of the other persons.

parse: Verb - Present Indicative Active - 3rd Person Plural
str2: Ultimately from a and hupnos; to be sleepless, i.e. Keep awake.
Gen: in behalf of; acc: above.

parse: Personal / Possessive Pronoun - Genitive 2nd Person Plural
str2: You. The person pronoun of the second person singular; thou.
From psucho; breath, i.e. spirit, abstractly or concretely.
Probably adverb of comparative from hos; which how, i.e. In that manner.

parse: Verb - Future Participle Active - Nominative Masculine Plural
str2: From apo and didomi; to give away, i.e. Up, over, back, etc.
From lego; something said; by implication, a topic, also reasoning or motive; by extension, a computation; specially, the Divine Expression.
In order that, so that. Probably from the same as the former part of heautou; in order that.

parse: Verb - Present Subjunctive Active - 3rd Person Plural
str2: (a) I make, manufacture, construct, (b) I do, act, cause. Apparently a prolonged form of an obsolete primary; to make or do.
This; he, she, it.
(a) gen: with, in company with, (b) acc: (1) behind, beyond, after, of place, (2) after, of time, with nouns, neut. of adjectives.
Joy, gladness, a source of joy. From chairo; cheerfulness, i.e. Calm delight.
And, even, also, namely.
Not, lest. A primary particle of qualified negation; not, lest; also (whereas ou expects an affirmative one) whether.

parse: Verb - Present Participle Active - Nominative Masculine Plural
str2: To groan, expressing grief, anger, or desire. From stenos; to make in straits, i.e. to sigh, murmur, pray inaudibly.
For. A primary particle; properly, assigning a reason.
This; he, she, it.
Profitless, unprofitable, ruinous, detrimental. Gainless, i.e. pernicious.

parse: Personal / Possessive Pronoun - Dative 2nd Person Plural
str2: You. The person pronoun of the second person singular; thou.
